data.title: Security
data.content: Infino uses advanced encryption technology to keep payment information secure. Infino Smart Card Vault is secure and protected by PCI DSS standards. A user can add a PIN or use your device biometrics for added security when viewing the card details or making a payment. Infino does not receive or store your device’s biometric information. We don’t automatically fill your CVV information into online stores. Since you are manually entering CVV, you can be sure that there won’t be any unauthorized transactions.

data.title: Privacy
data.content: Your credit or debit card information is not shared with buyers, sellers, or merchants, and is stored separately from your account data. Even Infino doesn’t have direct access to it.
